synopsis.text:
Because of their family businesses and close proximity, Koh Kitamura and the Tsukishima sisters have always shared a special bond. Koh, the son of a sporting goods store owner, and Wakaba, the second Tsukishima daughter, were born on the same day and have been inseparable since childhood. Despite Koh's lack of interest in baseball, he secretly trains at the Tsukishima family's batting center, hoping to become as skilled as Aoba, the third Tsukishima sister and a natural pitcher.

When a tragic event strikes, Koh's life takes a drastic turn. However, years later, he finds himself drawn back into the world of baseball at Seishuu Academy. Alongside Aoba, his old friend Nakanishi, and a new team of companions, Koh is determined to honor a promise made long ago and fulfill a shared dream. As he embarks on this journey, Koh must confront his past and discover if he has what it takes to become a champion on the legendary Koshien Stadium field.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
